lines: After searching ${enemyName}'s corpse, you have found some items
${enemyName} finally perishes to your attack, you carefully scour the area; and to your supprise, there lies the loot
It isn't easy to defeat a ${enemyLevel} level enemy, but you have conquered it. You approch and claim your rewards.
linesWithNoVariables: You have found some items from the enemy's corpse
